about_the_game:
RoGlass is a stained glass, tile-based, roguelite puzzle game where you place unique tiles to score points and unlock new spaces. Each tile scores points based on a different set of rules.
Your goal is to earn achievements that unlock new tile types, upgrades for existing tiles, new features, board space, and more.

Achievements consist of various challenges such as:

  • Reach a specified high score
  • Place tiles in a specific arrangement
  • Get tiles to be worth specific values
  • Combo tiles in a specific way

When you run out of tiles, you clear the board but keep your progress on achievements, upgrades, and spaces unlocked. Continue to expand the board and discover the secrets of RoGlass!

  • Add more spaces to the board
  • Unlock new tile types
  • Upgrade tiles
  • Unlock more features

Features:

  • Over 20 of the 100 goals are available in the demo
  • Unique achievement design where each of the achievements unlock upgrades and expand the board space
  • Upgrades change the rules, leading to over 50 stained glass tile variations that can be placed in millions of possible layouts
  • Minimalistic controls with easy to play click, drag and drop UI
  • Retain achievement progression and upgrades through roguelite elements
  • Utilize powerful upgrades to manipulate randomness to your advantage
